ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Billy Sun" <bsun@...>
>
>Is there any other place I can buy spell? I
currently is in
Freeport.
>Thanks.

Freeport has a huge library for lots of different
SpellCasters I just dropped in for a sec and looked at
the inventory of the first couple of merchants it was
called The Academy of Arcane Science.

Azzameen High Elf Wizard
Lost Order of Akalabeth
Veeshan Server
